    Modifier and Type Method Description
    protected ChoiceResponseMessage manageStateBuild​(int x, int y)
    This method integrate the manageStateBuild with specific message for the Player with Demeter's power.
    protected ChoiceResponseMessage manageTurn​(int x, int y, Worker.Gender gender, java.lang.String optional)

    Reset parameters of the turn of the Player with Demeter's power.

  • Method Details

    • resetTurn

      protected void resetTurn()
      Reset parameters of the turn of the Player with Demeter's power.
      Overrides:
      resetTurn in class Player

    • selectedWorkerBuild

      protected boolean selectedWorkerBuild​(int x, int y)
      This method implement the power of Demeter which allow the Player to build two times but on different cells (respecting the others building rules).

      Overrides:
      selectedWorkerBuild in class Player
      Parameters:
      x - first coordinate
      y - second coordinate
      Returns:
      true if was possible to build and performed; false otherwise

    • manageTurn

      protected ChoiceResponseMessage manageTurn​(int x, int y, Worker.Gender gender, java.lang.String optional)
      This method allow to integrate manageTurn with the state of turn of the possible double build expected by the power of Demeter.

      Overrides:
      manageTurn in class Player
      Parameters:
      x - first coordinate, when its value is relevant
      y - second coordinate, when its value is relevant
      gender - of the worker to select, when its value is needed
      optional - a particular choice of the player, when its value is needed. In this case it can specify if the Player want to build two times or not.
      Returns:
      ChoiceResponseMessage the message to notify to RemoteView

    • manageStateBuild

      protected ChoiceResponseMessage manageStateBuild​(int x, int y)
      This method integrate the manageStateBuild with specific message for the Player with Demeter's power.

      Overrides:
      manageStateBuild in class Player
      Parameters:
      x - first coordinate
      y - second coordinate
      Returns:
      ChoiceResponseMessage to return to manageTurn and (modified or not) then to RemoteView. Specify the result of the tried build.
